name: Imani
description:
This is just a project I had in mind for a while, and i didnt expect it to turn out half as good as it is right now .

I have been working on it for about two weeks ( yey quarantine!!) and i plan on keep on working on it until i finish , now that I dont know when it will be so yeah.

Right now I dont have much of the story , but its a female character , Imani, who has to explore the forest , that is filled with monsters. It's very simple for now , but i will make it an actual story .

Thanks for checking it out and hope you ahev a great day !!
